name: Toxic Towers
description:
Toxic Towers is an action platformer in which you navigate the ruined and polluted towers to purify the world of the toxic slime race. Be careful, coming into contact with the toxic clouds can be dangerous to your health.

Includes:
- 6+ Acts each with 3 different levels to complete
- 3 different slime bosses to slay
- Several upgrades to collect to aid your quest
- Lots of poisonous clouds to avoid
- Lava lamps
